net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.NumberValidator.NumberRestriction

  • Packages that use NumberValidator.NumberRestriction 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation
    This package contains classes related to component validation.

    • Uses of NumberValidator.NumberRestriction in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

      Fields in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation declared as NumberValidator.NumberRestriction 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.EVEN_NUMBER
      Restricts a number to be an even integer
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.NEGATIVE_RESTRICTION
      Restricts a number to be negative
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.NON_NEGATIVE_RESTRICTION
      Restricts a Number to be zero or positive
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.ODD_RESTRICTION
      Restricts a number to be an odd integer
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.POSITIVE_RESTRICTION
      Restricts a number to be postive
      Methods in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation that return NumberValidator.NumberRestriction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.createEqualityRestriction(double value)
      Creates a number restriction that requires a number to be equal to a value.
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.createLowerBoundInclusiveRestriction(double lowerBound)
      Creates a number restiction that restricts a number to be greater than or equal to a lower bound.
      static NumberValidator.NumberRestriction NumberValidator.createUpperBoundInclusiveRestriction(double upperBound)
      Creates a number restriction that restricts a number to be less than or equal to an upper bound.
